d:element.name: dataTree
d:element.d:resource: .btl-dataTree,.btl-dataTree *{box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-khtml-box-sizing:border-box;}.btl-dataTree{position:relative;overflow:auto;height:100%;width:100%;background-color:Window;-moz-outline:none;}.btl-dataTree *{zoom:1.0;}.btl-dataTree-focusElement{position:absolute;left:0;top:0;}.btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-content{padding-left:17px;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch-content{padding-left:0;padding-right:17px;}.btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator *,.btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator,.btl-dataTreeLeaf *,.btl-dataTreeLeaf{cursor:pointer;}.btl-dataTreeBranch-closed .btl-dataTreeItem,.btl-dataTreeBranch-closed .btl-dataTreeBranch-content,.btl-dataTreeBranch-empty .btl-dataTreeBranch-content{display:none;visibility:hidden;}.btl-dataTree-label-container{font-size:100%;line-height:130%;background-color:#FFF;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTree-label-container{direction:rtl;unicode-bidi:bidi-override;}.btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-div,.btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator{background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:0 center;}.btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator{padding-left:14px;position:relative;}.btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{padding-left:18px;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-div,.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator{background-position:100% center;padding-left:0;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator{padding-right:14px;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{padding-right:18px;}.btl-dataTreeLeaf .btl-dataTree-line-horizontal{padding-left:14px;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeLeaf .btl-dataTree-line-horizontal{padding-left:0;padding-right:14px;}.btl-dataTree-label{padding:1px 3px;color:WindowText;}.btl-dataTree-selected{background-color:Highlight;color:HighlightText;}.btl-dataTree-focus .btl-dataTreeItem-focus .btl-dataTree-focusIndicator{border:1px dotted black;padding:0 2px;}.btl-disabled .btl-dataTree-label{color:GrayText;}.btl-disabled .btl-dataTree-selected{color:InactiveCaptionText;background-color:InactiveCaption;}.btl-dataTreeBranch-open .btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator{background-image:url(media/treeBranchMinus.png);}.btl-dataTreeBranch-open .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{background-image:url(media/folderOpen.png);}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch-open .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{background-image:url(media/rtlFolderOpen.png);}.btl-dataTreeBranch-closed .btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator{background-image:url(media/treeBranchPlus.png);}.btl-dataTreeBranch-closed .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{background-image:url(media/folderClosed.png);}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch-closed .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{background-image:url(media/rtlFolderClosed.png);}.btl-dataTreeBranch-empty .btl-dataTreeBranch-stateIndicator{background-image:none;}.btl-dataTreeBranch-empty .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{background-image:url(media/folderClosed.png);}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeBranch-empty .btl-dataTreeBranch-div{background-image:url(media/rtlFolderClosed.png);}.btl-dataTreeLeaf .btl-dataTree-label-container{background-repeat:no-repeat;background-image:url(media/treeLeaf.png);background-position:0 center;padding-left:18px;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTreeLeaf .btl-dataTree-label-container{padding-left:0;padding-right:17px;background-position:100% center;}.btl-dataTree-line-vertical{background-image:url(media/treeLineVertical.png);background-repeat:repeat-y;background-position:0 0;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTree-line-vertical{background-position:100% 0;}.btl-dataTree-line-vertical-first{background-image:url(media/treeLineVerticalFirst.png);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:0 center;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTree-line-vertical-first{background-position:100% center;}.btl-dataTree-line-vertical2{background-image:url(media/treeLineVertical2First.png);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:0 center;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTree-line-vertical2{background-position:100% center;}.btl-dataTreeBranch-closed .btl-dataTree-line-vertical2{background-image:none;}.btl-dataTree-line-vertical-last{background-image:url(media/treeLineVerticalLast.png);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:0 center;background-color:Window;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTree-line-vertical-last{background-position:100% center;}.btl-dataTree-line-horizontal{background-image:url(media/treeLineHorizontal.png);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:0 center;}.btl-dataTree-rtl .btl-dataTree-line-horizontal{background-position:100% center;}.btl-dataTree-nolines .btl-dataTree-line-vertical-first,.btl-dataTree-nolines .btl-dataTree-line-vertical2,.btl-dataTree-nolines .btl-dataTree-line-vertical,.btl-dataTree-nolines .btl-dataTree-line-vertical-last,.btl-dataTree-nolines .btl-dataTree-line-horizontal{background-image:none;}
